mod.name: Hunter 猎人
mod.description:
New Character.It can summon minions and also more new mechanisms. It will continue update in the future.
 新角色，可以召唤随从，并且卡牌的机制不错，希望大家喜欢。后续内容会慢慢添加。

07-20-2019
1.Fix bugs.
2.Add 2 new cards.

1.修复了新版本闪退的bug。
2.添加了两张新卡，修改了部分卡。

cards.name: Take All+

cards.name: Time Travel+
cards.description: Mark your HP, at the end of battle, recover HP to the mark number.

cards.name: Unlimited Combo

cards.name: Unlimited Combo+
cards.description: Your combo card can trigger without other condition in this turn.

relics.name: Soul Bottle
relics.description:
You will gain 30 golds and increase 5 max HP when you level up.
You level is -1 .
Now need 0 exp to level up.
After finish enemy floor, normal: 2 exp, elite: 4 exp, boss: 10 exp.
The max level is 10. 
Reward: level 5: gain Hunter Medal.
relics.flavorText: Kill enemies can collect their souls.

relics.name: Hunter Medal
relics.flavorText: It proves your are a qualified hunter.

keywords.name: Arrow
keywords.description: It will derease 1 when you use the Bow.

keywords.name: Blood
keywords.description: It can't be play. Exhaust.

keywords.name: Bloodattack
keywords.description: 0 Cost. Deal 7 damage. Lose 1 HP. Exhaust.

keywords.name: Bow
keywords.description: Weapon. Click it to use. You can use it twice each turn.

keywords.name: Byrd
keywords.description: Byrd attack multiple times. 1 spirit can increase 1 time.

keywords.name: Combo
keywords.description: Combo card can trigger extra effcts when the card's level is the next. Combo-N can trigger when player combo isn't 0. Player combo level will disppear at the end of turn.

keywords.name: Cultist
keywords.description: Cultist can increase Strength each turn. 1 spirit can increase 1 this capacity.

keywords.name: Deathrattle
keywords.description: It will be triggered when minion die.

keywords.name: Echo
keywords.description: After use, give the same card to your hand. the same card is ethereal, exhaust and original cost.

keywords.name: Explode
keywords.description: When this minion die, it will deal the minion's current max HP to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Firstcombo
keywords.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain combo-1. Exhaust.

keywords.name: Gremlintsundere
keywords.description: GremlinTsundere can give you block. 1 spirit can increase 3 block amount.

keywords.name: Healer
keywords.description: Healer can heal your HP. 1 spirit can increase 2 heal amount.

keywords.name: Mana
keywords.description: Minion will die when mana is 0. At the end of each turn, mana decrease 1.

keywords.name: Minion
keywords.description: You can only summon 3 minions. when you have 3 minions, next minion will replace the left minion. Right click the minions can feed them.

keywords.name: Revenge
keywords.description: when this minion die, you will gain strength.

keywords.name: Righthook
keywords.description: Rare Card, Combo-3.

keywords.name: Sacrifice
keywords.description: When this minion die, you will heal HP.

keywords.name: Spirit
keywords.description: Spirit can enhance minions capicity.

keywords.name: Taunt
keywords.description: Enemies will attack the taunt minion first.

keywords.name: Vampire
keywords.description: When the Bow take damage.Heal HP equal the damage.
